My first impression is that the portfolios are like other robo-advisers. My glance into the portfolios tell me that the fund level fees are relatively high  and the fund manager Aberdeen appeared in those portfolios. I will give trustinvest a pass.
A closer look into trustinvest tells me that it is just investing into Aberdeen unit trust 😐
